Package Lab04B

Class Instructor

java.lang.Object
Lab04B.Instructor
Direct Known Subclasses:
Faculty, Grad, Lecturer
public abstract class Instructor extends Object
Abstract class creates a model defining how instructor objects cope with unread emails and stress, and how their eccentricities get affected.
